mapper.sql: id, name, address, asid, adid, aqid, axid, postcode, phone, owner, company, contact, mobile, turnover, area, population, fxd_count, sid, rid, business, territory, eid, stid, sfcjxsjh, jhdealer, crid, djdate, description, status,sfhz,pname,paddress,pcontact,pphone
mapper.select: select t.*, sheng.id as shengid,sheng.name as shengname, di.id as diid,di.name as diname, xian.id as xianid,xian.name as xianname, zhen.id as zhenid,zhen.name as zhenname, sr.id as srid,sr.name as srname, r.id as rid,r.name as rname, sh.id as shid,sh.name as shname, cr.id as crid,cr.name as crname, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename from dealerinfo t left outer join district sheng on t.asid=sheng.id left outer join district di on t.adid = di.id left outer join district xian on t.aqid=xian.id left outer join district zhen on t.axid=zhen.id left outer join strength_dic sr on t.sid =sr.id left outer join reputation_dic r on t.rid = r.id left outer join shoptype_dic sh on t.stid=sh.id left outer join credit_rating_dic cr on t.crid=cr.id left outer join employee em on t.eid = em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.jhdealer=de.id where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select t.*, sheng.id as shengid,sheng.name as shengname, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname from dealerinfo t left outer join district sheng on t.asid=sheng.id left outer join employee em on t.eid = em.id where (t.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" or t.contact like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" or em.fullname like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%") and t.status=0
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}

select t.*, sheng.id as shengid,sheng.name as shengname, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname from dealerinfo t left outer join district sheng on t.asid=sheng.id left outer join employee em on t.eid = em.id where t.status=0
limit ${offset}, ${pageSize}

select t.*, sheng.id as shengid,sheng.name as shengname, di.id as diid,di.name as diname, xian.id as xianid,xian.name as xianname, zhen.id as zhenid,zhen.name as zhenname, sr.id as srid,sr.name as srname, r.id as rid,r.name as rname, sh.id as shid,sh.name as shname, cr.id as crid,cr.name as crname, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename from dealerinfo t left outer join district sheng on t.asid=sheng.id left outer join district di on t.adid = di.id left outer join district xian on t.aqid=xian.id left outer join district zhen on t.axid=zhen.id left outer join strength_dic sr on t.sid =sr.id left outer join reputation_dic r on t.rid = r.id left outer join shoptype_dic sh on t.stid=sh.id left outer join credit_rating_dic cr on t.crid=cr.id left outer join employee em on t.eid = em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.jhdealer=de.id where t.status=0

select t.*, sheng.id as shengid,sheng.name as shengname, di.id as diid,di.name as diname, xian.id as xianid,xian.name as xianname, zhen.id as zhenid,zhen.name as zhenname, sr.id as srid,sr.name as srname, r.id as rid,r.name as rname, sh.id as shid,sh.name as shname, cr.id as crid,cr.name as crname, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename from dealerinfo t left outer join district sheng on t.asid=sheng.id left outer join district di on t.adid = di.id left outer join district xian on t.aqid=xian.id left outer join district zhen on t.axid=zhen.id left outer join strength_dic sr on t.sid =sr.id left outer join reputation_dic r on t.rid = r.id left outer join shoptype_dic sh on t.stid=sh.id left outer join credit_rating_dic cr on t.crid=cr.id left outer join employee em on t.eid = em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.jhdealer=de.id where t.status=0 and t.sfhz=1

select count(*) from dealerinfo t left outer join employee em on t.eid = em.id where (t.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" or t.contact like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" or em.fullname like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%") and t.status=0
select count(*) from dealerinfo where status=0

select t.*, sheng.id as shengid,sheng.name as shengname, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname from dealerinfo t left outer join district sheng on t.asid=sheng.id left outer join employee em on t.eid = em.id where t.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.eid=#{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.status=0
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}

select t.*, sheng.id as shengid,sheng.name as shengname, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname from dealerinfo t left outer join district sheng on t.asid=sheng.id left outer join employee em on t.eid = em.id where t.status=0 and t.eid=#{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
select count(*) from dealerinfo where name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and eid=#{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status=0
mapper.insert: insert into dealerinfo (id, name, address, asid, adid, aqid, axid, postcode, phone, owner, company, contact, mobile, turnover, area, population, fxd_count, sid, rid, business, territory, eid, stid, sfcjxsjh, jhdealer, crid, djdate, description, status,sfhz,pname,paddress,pcontact,pphone) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shengfen.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{diqu.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{xian.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{zhen.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{turnover,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{area,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{population,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fxdCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{strength.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reputation.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{business,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{territory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agent.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shoptype.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sfcjxsjh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jhdea.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creditrating.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{djdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{sfhz,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcontact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update dealerinfo
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
asid = #{shengfen.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
adid = #{diqu.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
aqid = #{xian.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
axid = #{zhen.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
postcode = #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
owner = #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
turnover = #{turnover,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
area = #{area,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
population = #{population,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fxd_count = #{fxdCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sid = #{strength.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rid = #{reputation.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
business = #{business,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
territory = #{territory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eid = #{agent.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stid = #{shoptype.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sfcjxsjh = #{sfcjxsjh,jdbcType=INTEGER},
jhdealer = #{jhdea.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
crid = #{creditrating.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
djdate = #{djdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sfhz = #{sfhz,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pname = #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paddress = #{paddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pcontact = #{pcontact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pphone = #{pphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update dealerinfo set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, asid = #{shengfen.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, adid = #{diqu.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, aqid = #{xian.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, axid = #{zhen.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, postcode = #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, owner = #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, turnover = #{turnover,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, area = #{area,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, population = #{population,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fxd_count = #{fxdCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sid = #{strength.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rid = #{reputation.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, business = #{business,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, territory = #{territory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eid = #{agent.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stid = #{shoptype.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sfcjxsjh = #{sfcjxsjh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jhdealer = #{jhdea.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, crid = #{creditrating.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, djdate = #{djdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sfhz = #{sfhz,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pname = #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paddress = #{paddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pcontact = #{pcontact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pphone = #{pphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
